scenario_text.value:
(It’s Shuuji and Lopmon. What’re they doing
here?)
Ha! Hyaaah!
Good. Just like that, Lopmon!
Damn! *huff* *huff*
Shuuji!
You okay, Shuuji? We should take a break...

No, not yet... If I get tired this early, I’m
no good to anyone...
B-but still...

(Those two are doing special training? Looks
like they’re pushing themselves too hard.)

I’ve just been a burden on everybody up to
now... I have to make up for it, or else...

That’s not true... No one thinks of you that
way, Shuuji.

That’s not what I’m saying, Lopmon. This
is...my own problem.

This is something I want. Confidence to stand
side-by-side next to everyone, with pride.

It’s not about what the others think—or my
dad, even. I want my own approval.
Shuuji...
An attack? Now? Are you serious?!
Krishaaa!!!

Ugh... Damn, I’m too tired. My legs are like
lead...
I’m here for you, Shuuji!
Takuma?! How long have you—?!
Don’t worry, leave this to me, Takuma.

It’s too much, Lopmon! You’re just as tired
as Shuuji!

It’s fine, I wouldn’t be able to forgive
myself if I ran from this.
Lopmon...

C’mon, let’s fight, Shuuji! Let’s show ’em
how strong you are!
